title: ""
report-title: "Report Title"

report-author: "Your Name, PhD"
format:
  typst:
    papersize: us-letter
    margin:
      top: 1in
      bottom: 1in

```{=typst}
// UA Brand Colors
#let ua-blue = rgb("#0C234B")
#let ua-red = rgb("#AB0520")
#let ua-cool-gray = rgb("#E2E9EB")

// Title Page
#set page(margin: (top: 2in, bottom: 1in, left: 1.25in, right: 1.25in))

#align(center)[
  #image("assets/infosci-logo.png", width: 60%)
]

#v(1in)

#align(center)[
  #text(size: 28pt, weight: "bold", fill: ua-blue)[
    {{< meta report-title >}}
  ]

  #v(0.2in)

  #text(size: 16pt, fill: ua-blue)[
    {{< meta report-subtitle >}}
  ]
]

#v(1in)

#align(center)[
  #text(size: 12pt)[
    *Prepared by:*

    {{< meta report-author >}} \
    Your Title \
    College of Information Science \
    University of Arizona
  ]
]

#v(0.5in)

#align(center)[
  #text(size: 12pt)[
    #datetime.today().display("[month repr:long] [day], [year]")
  ]
]

#pagebreak()

// Reset margins for body
#set page(margin: (top: 1in, bottom: 1in, left: 1.25in, right: 1.25in))

// Table of Contents
#text(size: 18pt, weight: "bold", fill: ua-blue)[Table of Contents]
#v(0.1in)
#line(length: 100%, stroke: 1pt + ua-red)
#v(0.2in)
#outline(title: none, depth: 2)

#pagebreak()

// Heading styles
#show heading.where(level: 1): it => {
  v(0.3in)
  text(size: 16pt, weight: "bold", fill: ua-blue)[#it.body]
  v(0.1in)
  line(length: 100%, stroke: 1pt + ua-red)
  v(0.2in)
}

#show heading.where(level: 2): it => {
  v(0.2in)
  text(size: 13pt, weight: "bold", fill: ua-blue)[#it.body]
  v(0.1in)
}

#show heading.where(level: 3): it => {
  v(0.15in)
  text(size: 11pt, weight: "bold")[#it.body]
  v(0.05in)
}
```
